name: Meenakshi Amman Temple
description: A historic Hindu temple located on the southern bank of the Vaigai River, dedicated to Meenakshi, a form of Parvati, and her consort, Sundareswarar.

name: Thirumalai Nayakkar Palace
description: A 17th-century palace constructed by King Thirumalai Nayak, showcasing the grandeur of Dravidian and Rajput architectural styles.

name: Gandhi Memorial Museum
description: A museum dedicated to Mahatma Gandhi, located in the Tamukkam Palace, showcasing artifacts and exhibits related to his life and India's independence struggle.

name: Koodal Azhagar Temple
description: A revered Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Vishnu, known for its intricate architecture and religious significance.

name: Vaigai Dam
description: A scenic dam across the Vaigai River, offering beautiful views and a peaceful environment.
